fields.title: Sniper: The Last Stand
fields.description: On a mission to stop an arms dealer from unleashing a deadly weapon, ace sniper Brandon Beckett and Agent Zero lead a group of elite soldiers against an unrelenting militia in Costa Verde.

fields.title: God's Crooked Lines
fields.description: Private investigator Alice checks into a psychiatric hospital feigning paranoia to collect evidence for a case she's working on: the death of an inmate under ambiguous circumstances. The reality she faces in her confinement exceeds her expectations and casts doubt on her own sanity.

fields.title: Indecent Proposal
fields.description: A young married couple in love accepts a loan to build a house. But recession creates a monumental crisis for them. A man offers them a monetary solution which may, however, jeopardise their marriage

fields.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
fields.description: Bridget, a single woman, writes a diary focusing on how she wants to change her life. However, after two romantic encounters, her perspective changes drastically.

fields.title: The Lake House
fields.description: Two tenants of a lake house, who lived there at different times, begin to exchange letters through the mailbox. Their attempt to meet is unsuccessful and painful for Kate. But, destiny has its ways.

fields.title: Stardust
fields.description: Tristan promises Victoria to get a star from the magical kingdom of Stormhold that exists beyond the Wall. Trying to keep his promise, Tristan ends up having an adventure that changes his life.
